Text: I was just wondering what program or what I have to do to make the subtitles work. My Japanese is very rusty so I need the Eng. Sub. If anyone would happen to know it would be of great help. Thank you. (I use either Windows Player, or DivX Player.)

@Kurosawa1291:

For subtitles on Windows platform:
Use K-Lite Codec with Media Player Classic,
or:
Use MP with VobSync
